message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this incredible product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. Would you like to take it for $12000?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. Would you be willing to consider a lower price? I'd be happy to pay $9000 for it.

I understand you think the product is a bit pricey, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $10500 out of it. Would you be willing to go up to that price?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9800? I'm really interested in the product and think it's worth it to me at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm starting to think you really do see the value in this product. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to get at least $10200 out of it. Would you be willing to meet me at $10200?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to meet me at $9900? I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $10500 out of it. Would you be willing to meet me at $10500?

I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product would be a great addition to my collection. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500? I'm willing to make a final offer and see if we can come to an agreement.
I can see you're serious about getting this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get at least $10000 out of it. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
